column2: We are looking for r     ole models in displaying self-discipline, professionalism and sensitivity towards the children, teachers and the environment around us. The purpose of this position is to ensure academic excellence in classes/subjects, planning, designing and implementing the curriculum. Developing children s interests, abilities and coordination using a variety of creative activities     Maintaining productive working habits and discipline in the classroom. Captains for various disciplines should be appointed. Children must be encouraged to clean their own classroom after break, as well as in the normal course of the day     One copy of the time-table, Home-work schedule and assessment schedule should be pinned on the board in the respective classrooms so that it is available to the substitute teacher taking the class in case of absence of a teacher     Any teacher planning to take leave, must prepare work plan and give clear instructions so that his/her classes are conducted properly by the substitute teacher     Every teacher is expected to know his/her subjects well, keep himself / herself informed on the latest trends in education and to take advantage of various workshops and seminars being held from time to time. column2: We are seeking Digital Marketing Trainers to join our team. The candidate must come with teaching experience. The ideal candidates will have digital marketing experience, a passion for teaching, and the ability to communicate complex concepts to learners effectively. As a Digital Marketing Trainer, you will be responsible for delivering high-quality training sessions, providing hands-on practical exercises, and guiding learners towards achieving their goals in digital marketing.                      Responsibilities:                    Conduct engaging and interactive digital marketing training sessions to learners in Tamil Nadu.            Design and develop comprehensive training modules that cover various aspects of digital marketing, including SEO, SEM, social media marketing, content marketing, email marketing, etc.            Deliver training content effectively using a variety of instructional techniques and formats, such as presentations, workshops, group discussions, and hands-on exercises.            Provide personalized guidance and support to learners, helping them understand and apply digital marketing concepts in real-world scenarios.            Assess learner progress, identify knowledge gaps, and provide constructive feedback to ensure continuous improvement.            Stay updated with the latest trends, tools, and techniques in digital marketing and incorporate them into training programs.            Travel to different training locations within Tamil Nadu to conduct on-site training programs as required.            Travel will be to following districts: Ariyalur, Karur, Nagapattinam, Perambalur, Pudukkottai, Thanjavur, Tiruchirappalli, Tiruvarur.              Requirements                Work experience in teaching is preferred.(Teaching experience in Digital Marketing is preferable, but not compulsory)            Knowledge of digital marketing concepts, tools, and strategies would be ideal            Good command of English and Tamil language is needed. Good spoken Tamil skills is a must.            Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to simplify complex concepts for learners.            Passion for teaching and the ability to inspire and motivate learners.            Ability to adapt training methodologies to cater for diverse learner backgrounds and learning styles.            Up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and best practices in digital marketing.            Relevant certifications in digital marketing will be an added advantage.            Candidate must be physically located in any of these districts - Ariyalur, Karur, Nagapattinam, Perambalur, Pudukkottai, Thanjavur, Tiruchirappalli, Tiruvarur, and will need to travel to local colleges            We are looking for both Full time and Part time trainers.                Education:                Preference will be given to Post Graduates or Post graduate students.              Must have:                              Please note candidate must have a laptop and excellent internet connection                             English and Tamil language speaking skills are a must.
column11: Social media marketing, Training, SAN, Email marketing, SOC, SMS, SEM, SEO, Digital marketing, CRM
